title: Beth hemispherectomy cognitive abilities at age 5

content.question: Beth received a surgery in which half of her cortex was removed to treat a seizure disorder when she was two years old. However, by the time she was five years old, her cognitive abilities were the same as those of a neurotypical five year old. Which of the following best explains her abilities?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
